contents: Article 9 (Dismissal of a member) The chairman may dismiss a member in any of the following cases. However, in cases falling under subparagraphs 5 and 6, it must be dismissed. Revised on January 31, 2019. 1. When a member declares that it is difficult for him or her to perform his/her duties. 2. When there is a case of misconduct related to his or her duties. 3. When the obligations under Article 13-2 are not observed. Newly established on January 1, 2019. 31. 4. If it is deemed unsuitable to be a member due to neglect of duty, loss of dignity, illness, or other reasons. 5. If it does not evade despite falling under Article 13. 6. If the member wishes to submit a resignation letter. If submitted
